name: Stg.Oceana's Melon
description:
This is a 2 weeks student project.

The radar of the submarine is broken. It is up to Stg.Oceana the dolphin to help navigate the sub through a naval mine field.

This game uses voice control but it's optional. The game is still playable with just keyboard.

Known bug:
- When space bar is press too frequently, the echolocation effect breaks. 

The melon is a mass of adipose tissue found in the forehead of dolphins. It focuses and modulates the animal's vocalizations and acts as a sound lens. It is thus a key organ involved in communication and echolocation.

*We do not own any of the character in Full Metal Jacket and are not monetising our game.*

Voice Actor:
- Aaron McDougall (The General, The Crew Member, Stg.Oceana)

Sounds: 
- https://www.zapsplat.com/

Sprite: 
- https://opengameart.org/content/2d-arts-for-submarine-sidescroller
- https://opengameart.org/content/underwater-diving-pack
- https://eccothedolphin.online
